text: jinsillo geudaedeul-eun geudaedeul-ui jaesangwa saengmyeong-e gwanhayeo siheombad-eul geos-imyeo, geudaedeul ijeon-e seongseoleul bad-eun jadeulgwa hananimkke daedeunghan jonjaeleul duneun jadeullobuteo gochung-ui mal-eul manh-i deul-eul geos-ila. geudaedeul-i innaehago (hananim-eul) gyeong-oehandamyeon sillo geugeos-eun danhohan uijiga yogudoeneun il-ila
